member.name: M:DSExperimentation.DSECompilerExtentions.SplitAtWithoutRemoving(System.String,System.Char[])
member.summary:
(MullNet CompilerExtention) Splits the String whenever one of the _CharsAtWhichToSplitString occours, but the _CharAtWhichToSplitString stays in each New String
"Hello, World; Today" and {","c, ";"c} Becomes {"Hello", ", World", "; Today"}
member.returns: The _InputString split at each occourance of a _CharAtWhichToSplitString

member.name: M:DSExperimentation.DSECompilerExtentions.WithLeadingWhiteSpaceRemoved(System.String)
member.summary: (MullNet CompilerExtention) Returns a version of the string with any Spaces, Tabs, or LineBreak Characters which appear at the start of the String removed.
member.param: The String which may contain Leading Whitespace Characters
member.returns: The String without the Leading (preceding) WhiteSpace Characters
member.remarks: Only returns the resultant output; does not modify the Input String. Chars removed (ASCII): 09, 10, 11, 12, 13, 32

member.name: M:DSExperimentation.DSECompilerExtentions.WithTrailingWhiteSpaceRemoved(System.String)
member.summary: (MullNet CompilerExtention) Returns a version of the string with any Spaces, Tabs, or LineBreak Characters which appear at the end of the String removed.
member.param: The String which may contain Trailing Whitespace Characters
member.returns: The String without the Trailing (following) WhiteSpace Characters
member.remarks: Only returns the resultant output; does not modify the Input String. Chars removed (ASCII): 09, 10, 11, 12, 13, 32

member.summary: (MullNet CompilerExtention) Removes the First Character from the String
